message: So Geeks, What is the best tab management addon for Mozzarella Firefox? I want something with search tabs and ability to close tabs from a website. Like If I have 10 tabs open from FB, I'd like to close them with one click,

data.message:
Mozzarella Firefox ='D ?
OK NOW I AM EATING
Oh, I must have found advanced Geeks 2.0 that have the humor module installed....
No, seriously.. That's a module called retro setback installed optimized for Netscape, Lycos, exc!te, Geocities and Hotmail of course!

فيه اضافه بس مافيهاش اللى انت طلبته لان هى بتعتمد على انك تكون فاتح اكتر من تاب فبتحولهم فى تاب واحد عباره عن هايبر لينك لكل تاب وممكن ترجعلها فى اى وقت او تعمل شير للداتا كصفحه ويب بس بتبقى مفيده فى حاله لو فاتح حجات كتير وحسيت ان الجهاز هيهنج او انك عايز تحفظ التابات وهتشوف هتبدا بايه وهكذا وهى موجوده للفايرفوكس وكروم وممكن تشير الداتا بينهم عادى وده وصف ليها افضل
https://www.one-tab.com/
انا شفت حاجة زي كده بس مش فاكر اسمها Mosab Ahmad
el 2a5 samy 7afezlo klmten mn australia el nas hnak etarya2o 3leh beehom fa gai y2olhomlena : D
Hazem Ahmed which words did I memorize exactly?

There was an addon called Tree Tab or something like that, it turns your tab list into a tree with collapsable nodes and everything, it allows you to organize your tabs in ony way you want (close a tab and it's sub tabs for example), and you can make the tab list on the left with auto-hide.
I used to have it back when I was using Firefox (before IE9), but it was too much control for something as simple as browser tabs.

I created a little addon to do exactly that :)

http://power-close.mos3abof.com/
It only closes tabs with urls containing a keyword though, nothing fancy.
